charges.charge_disposition: It is the judgment of the crt that the dft is h/b comm to cust of BOP to be imprisoned for a term of 55 mos on ea of cts 1 and 2, conc. Upon release from imprisonment dft shall be placed on supv release for a term of 3 yrs, cts 1 and 2, conc, under terms and conditions (refer to J&;C entered 7/27/92) 1) comply w/rules and regulations of USPO and gen ord 318 2) participate in program for treatment of narcotic addiction or drug dependency which may include counseling and testing to determine if dft has reverted to use of drugs 3) reside at and participate in a residential drug treatment program for treatment of narc addiction or drug dependecy whaih may include counslingand testing. Pursuant to guidelines fines wvd, including the costs of imprisonment and supv, dft does not have ability to pay, dft informed of right to appeal (1-2)
